com.vmworld.entity

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmworld.entity.Account

  • public class Account
extends java.lang.Object
    Model class representing a bank account linked to a customer
    Contains metadata like current balance, transaction history and account number.
    See Also:
    Transaction

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Account()
      Default constructor for creating a new Account
      Initializes the account with a fixed-size transaction array.
      Account(long accountNumber, double balance, Transaction[] transactions)
      Parameterized constructor for creating a new Account with predefined values/attributes.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Gets the account number

      Gets the array of transactions associated with the account.

      Sets the account number
      void setBalance(double balance)
      Sets the initial balance of the account after performing a validation check

      Returns a string representing of the account.

        public void setBalance(double balance)
                throws java.lang.RuntimeException
        Sets the initial balance of the account after performing a validation check
        Parameters:
        balance - the balance to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if customer tries to open an account less than minimum balance

      • setTransactions
